topic.title: Cannot login with unique private key
topic.body:
I have created zeroid and enabled Multiuser plugin, but when I login with the saved unique private key, I am still cannot use zeroid (the same as login with new private key.

There is a `master_seed`  field in users.json but not the same as the saved unique private key, and doesn't work also.

1604066041_mirrored_tantalate_github.body: @l5h5t7  Do you mean I should open zeroid.bit site?  I tried, but with no effect. When I click the "Login as" button, there is a `zeroid.bit Register>>` on the popup.
